notes.home: Identified `font-display: optional` in `app/layout.tsx` causing delayed text visibility (LCP bottleneck) and potential fallback persistence issues.

planned_fix.rationale: Improves LCP by showing fallback text immediately (vs blocking for up to 100ms). Improves UX by ensuring custom font eventually loads. CLS risk is mitigated by `next/font` fallback metric overrides.
planned_fix.verification_plan: Run `pnpm build` and `pnpm lint` to ensure stability.

verification.details: Build passed successfully. Fixed unrelated build errors in `app/page.tsx` (duplicate import), `app/api/ai-booking/route.ts` (duplicate identifier), `app/api/ai/summarize/route.ts` (implicit any, jsdom types), `components/TeleconsultationForm.tsx` (missing argument), `src/components/AppointmentFormTracker.tsx` (argument type), and `app/_components/Button.tsx` (prop spread types).
verification.expected_impact: Text should now be visible immediately on load (fallback font), improving LCP. Custom font will swap in when loaded. No significant CLS expected.
